sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I cannot access the Game Performance Reporting Service
  • I am receiving a 403 error when I try to use Game Performance Reporting

sections.title: Cause
content: The Unity Game Performance Reporting Service is currently available to Unity 5.x Pro license holders only. If you are a 3.x or 4.x Pro license holder, or are using Unity 5.x Personal Edition, you will not have access to this Service.

sections.title: Resolution
content: If you wish to upgrade a current Pro license, or purchase a new one, you can contact Sales here.
If you are using a Pro 5.x license and still having trouble accessing the Game Performance Reporting Service, please get in touch with Support by submitting a new ticket here.

sections.title: More Information
content: Please see this tutorial for guidance on setting up Game Performance Reporting in Unity 5.x
